post.desc:
And her hips too, it seems...

Hmm... while [**Dai's sprite**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Daiyousei) has feathers in *EoSD*, they seem to be missing in *GFW* ? The default for most artists seems to be the usual translucent wings. But wow – [**Risui's rendition**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/File:WOoHSDaiyousei.png) with the feathers looks really good.
